name: messenger lazy dark (facebook messenger)
description:
CAUTION!!: (PLEASE READ!! IM A GIRLðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­)
use Stylus addon intead :] (cause stylish is sus)
>> Download Stylus Add-on
then: install the style through userstyles.world (community-driven)
>> Install style here! Custom background:
  • - you can only apply image that are jpg photos uploaded within facebook (incl. giphy/tenor) due to Content Security Policy.
  • - to get the link of a photo uploaded in facebook, simply view the photo on gallery view mode, then right click on the photo and find the option that lets you copy the image link.
  • - then place this link into either of the two current available text box in style setting (the style setting can be accessed by clicking on the stylus icon then click on the wrench icon beside the style name).
